Package org.diirt.support.ca

Support for Epics 3 data source (channel syntax).

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    JCATypeAdapterSet  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    JCAConnectionPayload
    Represents the connection payload, which consists of the actual JCA Channel and the JCADataSource (which can be used to extract configuration parameters).
    JCADataSource
    A data source that uses jca.
    JCADataSourceConfiguration
    Configuration for JCADataSource.
    JCADataSourceProvider
    DataSourceProvider for channel access.
    JCAMessagePayload
    Represent the payload produced at each monitor event, consisting of both the metadata and the event data.
    JCATypeAdapter
    Type adapter for JCA data source.
    JCATypeSupport
    Given a set of JCATypeAdapter prepares type support for the JCA data source.
    JCAVTypeAdapterSet  

Package org.diirt.support.ca Description

Support for Epics 3 data source (channel syntax).

The JCADataSource uses the MultiplexedChannelHandler. The connection payload used is the JCA Channel class directly. The payload for each monitor event is the JCAMessagePayload, which includes both metadata (taken with a GET at connection time) and value (taken from the MONITOR event).

The conversion between JCAMessagePayload and the actual type, is done through the JCATypeAdapter. A JCATypeSupport can be passed directly to the JCADataSource so that one can configure support for different types.
